title: Job-Based Mathematics Learning: An Ethnographic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners access LMS via smartphones, with emphasis on applying mathematics to everyday problem-solving, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners analyze mathematical problems arising in daily work situations using ethnographic observation techniques and derive at least three problem-solving strategies.
By observing peers’ mathematical problem-solving processes, learners provide collaborative feedback and improve their own problem-solving approaches in at least two ways.
Learners mathematically analyze real-world data collected from work environments (e.g., budget management, time planning) and present at least one evidence-based decision-making rationale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
